title: Final Project Achievement. "Special Emote"
body:
Recently just completed the final mission whee you have to win a match made pvp game on summoners rift in under 33 mins. I played a Kogmaw game and won at 32:52. The achievement still says i haven't completed it. I had the ashe project icon the blue triangle one. 

If anyone could help that would be great.

replies.body: Sure enough, that match was completed in 32 min and 52 sec, which as far as I can tell should have completed that last mission. Make sure you refresh your client and double check that it hasn't been completed by now ^_^!
Thanks after i played one game the client said mission pending then it was complete and i got the emote!

Huzzah ^_^!!! Might have just been wee-bit delayed on your end.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
